divs: sighting detailsi work at a motel, and while i was out doing a security walk around i saw the object appear at cloud level over a nearby buiding. because i had seen a few objects over the summer, i had my camera in the office of the motel, just incase i saw something again. when i did, i ran and got the camera, and a guest and i watched the object while i recorded it. i have no idea what this was. it appeared to be a large upright cylinder of multi-colored flashing light(s). it hovered on occation and moved slowly, until it disappeared shortly after i took the video. here is a video link to my capture of the event. (this is a fairly high quality video of three clips) http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=830z3zzlhwk
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Vernon
There was one other sighting in Vernon on or around July 25th 2008
